author: Simon Difford
description: A foam-topped blue riff on two classic cocktails which honours two men named Cox as well as our friend Hannah Sharman-Cox.
name: Sharman-Cox Daiquiri
recipeIngredient: 60 ml White (charcoal-filtered) 1-4 year old light rum
10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain back into shaker
DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass
